section: Academic
title: Progress
content: I feel I understand the subject and learn something in each lesson

section: Academic
title: Homework
content: I find homework is worthwhile and helps me become more confident in the subject

section: Academic
title: Feedback
content: My teacher gives me regular feedback (either verbal or written) and I know what I need to do to improve.

section: Academic
title: Support
content: I feel I get enough support and I know where to go to get extra help.

section: Academic
title: Love of Learning
content: Even if lessons are difficult or I don't like what we are learning about, the teacher inspires me and I grow in confidence.

content: The school responds effectively when pupils use unkind or prejudiced language to each other, for example, comments about sex, ethnicity or faith

content: The school deals with all types of bullying and harassment effectively.

content: The school treats children fairly, regardless of their sex, faith, race or needs.

content: The school responds promptly and effectively to my concerns or complaints.

content: The school encourages my child to adopt a healthy lifestyle.
